text: Begović is a surname, derived from Ottoman Turkish word bey (beg in Serbo- Croatian) meaning "chieftain" or "lord". It is borne by ethnic Bosniaks, Serbs and Croats in former Yugoslavia. Its literal meaning is "chieftain's son". It may refer to: *Asmir Begović (b. 1987), Bosnian footballer *Boris Begović (b. 1956), Serbian economist *Ena Begović (1960–2000), Croatian actress *Milan Begović (1876–1948), Croatian writer *Nenad Begović (b. 1980), Serbian footballer *Vinko Begović (b. 1948), Croatian football coach ==See also== *Begić *Begovich, anglicized version Category:Bosnian-language surnames Category:Croatian-language surnames Category:Serbian-language surnames
title: Begović
